text: [Music]
princess nina and the center brothers
once upon a time beyond the pyramids the
red sea and the tower that touched the
sky
[Music]
there stood a purple forest called the
miracle land miracle land was home to
the most beautiful magical creatures on
earth and was protected by a magical
dome bubble that kept it invisible from
the rest of the world miracle land was
ruled by the centur brothers the half
man and half horse beings the eldest
brother
pegye sander was the wisest and the most
intelligent of the three he took all the
decisions related to law and order in
the kingdom but he was also very
short-tempered the second brother Dorado
was the strongest and in charge of
protecting the magical dome from
intruders the youngest brother Aryan was
the most handsome and good-looking
creature in the whole kingdom
he was so attractive that the mermaids
fairies and the dragon ladies couldn't
help falling in love with him Aryan was
in charge of wizardry and magic and
ensured that no one ever used spells for
the wrong reasons
together the three centur brothers ruled
miracle end and ensured that everyone
stayed happily and peacefully when
spring came it was time for the
customary greatest magician championship
witches and wizards from different parts
of miracle and came to participate
the centur brothers being the greatest
magicians of the land were the judges
the crowd waited in anticipation at
first came the ice jams II we bowed in
front of the brothers and then made an
ice structure come out of Pegasus glass
which looks exactly like peg ascender
Pekka sander smiled the crowd cheered
[Applause]
next came in a moving water barrel the
green Merman he bowed down in front of
the brothers and then created water
bubbles in the air he then leaped in the
air from the water turning into tiny
versions of himself trapped in the
bubbles the bubbles came together and
Green Merman appeared again in his real
son peg ascender looked at Dorado and
nodded next came the lion toned who
could bounce like no one else could then
a dragon Lea followed by a fairy
it went on for the whole day and the
crowd loved it when the brothers finally
started discussing amongst themselves as
to who the winner should be suddenly
they heard someone call hello is anyone
there I think I am lost nutrition Aryan
at once stood up and moved his wand but
before he could make a spell emerged
from the bushes a lady so beautiful that
he rose the lady who was dressed in a
beautiful blue gown looked like a
princess
[Music]
the lady fell
all the Americans gathered around her
and looked at her in awe how could a
human enter miracle der Allah leapt in
the air flying his army followed him in
the air as they left one by one to
meanwhile Aryan closed his eyes and
pushed his finger on Nana's temple what
can you see only her name Princess Nina
but I can't see anything else her
memories are blurry guards carrier to
the prison and seal her until Dorado
finds out who this intruder is and what
her motives are the guards at once using
their magic lifted Nana and took her
towards the prison Tower while she
floated in the air senseless that night
Dorado came back to his brothers and
explained that he was unable to find out
how Princess Nina had entered miracle
and as the magical dome was perfectly
sealed from all sides
we keep investigating Bird has never
happened that a human has set foot in
our land and we should plan to keep it
that way
till then the damsel stays as a prisoner
Dorado nodded and left while Aryan
looked concerned later that night Aryan
that his magic appeared in the prison
where Nina was kept
she was lying down and weeping when she
saw Aryan she at once fell on his feet
please let me go for I have not done
anything wrong and most certainly do not
wish to I was brought here by a tornado
that wrecked my entire kingdom
please let me free you Horseman hearing
her call him a horseman Aryan chuckled
[Music]
do not worry o fair lady now that I know
who you are I shall tell my brother's
all about it and they will sate you free
thank you so much horsemen
can we please tell them now for this
prison is making it difficult for me to
breathe I want to breathe fresh air my
eldest brother
pegye Xander takes his sleep very
seriously and no one is allowed to
disturb him while he sleeps but don't
worry with my magic I will take you to
the open garden where you can breathe
fresh air under the stars and before the
Sun comes out we will be back to the
prison and then I will go and tell my
brother everything about you you're a
kind Hoffman sleepy bat who was hanging
upside down outside the prison trying to
sleep cleared his throat
please get some sleep
sorry sleepy bat we will leave you to it
Aryan with his magical wand created a
sparkling opening at the home and the
two went out of the prison holding hands
sleepy bat closed his eyes while
murmuring outside the moon shone
brightly and the stars looked as
beautiful as it ever could be Aryan with
his magic wand turned into a human naina
looked at him in awe for it was only
under the moonlight that she could see
his face clearly she at once fell in
love with him the two laid down in the
soft grass and stared at the stars
without saying a word their fingers
intertwined as they held hands
the soft breeze gently blew their hair
and soon the tooth fell asleep when the
Sun rose the next day a guard rushed
into the courtroom and informed Pekka
sander that princess naina was missing
Big Brother do not worry for the
Danville must have not gone too far I
shall bring her back to you no I will
catch that prisoner with my own hands
guards inform Aryan to meet us at once
we are out looking for the prisoner
the guards nodded and the two centre
brothers went flying in the air
meanwhile Ariana naina woke up as the
Rays of the Sun fell on their faces the
two smiled at each other I enjoyed your
companionship hosts Aryan my name is
Aryan the two smiled and hugged each
other the warmth of her hug turned Aryan
back into a center again pegye sander
and Doral Oh who were out flying looking
for the princess suddenly caught sight
of them traitor
Ariana naina turned towards them as the
two landed furious pekus Tiger removed
his sword and put it on Aryans shoulder
you betrayer the damsel means more to
you than your brothers and miracle big
brother please I can explain there is no
need for any explanations and we have
seen what needed to be seen with our own
eyes he moved forward and snatched
Aryans wand from his hand
I'd have sentenced you to death if you
were not my brother but I think this
will be a better punishment for you
Pekka sander pointed his wand at Aryans
wand and
with all of its matches you are hereby
exiled from miracle and as soon as you
step out of the dope you will turn into
the human form you so willingly put up
for this damsel but Big Brother Brothers
decisions are final leave ariana naina
turned and left as Aryan stepped out of
the dome he transformed into his human
form the two held hands and set out to
go as far away from miracle land as
possible Ariane was sad and naina was
sad because she blamed herself for it
all
later that day when they sat near stream
to eat fruits and drink water a few soul
rivers in the air they laughed evilly
[Laughter]
their leader shadow ha was the most evil
soul Ripper of them all
[Music]
area the most beautiful Center without
here in a human form with a human lady
so it is true
you've been exiled from miracle naina
hid behind ariane as he stared at shadow
ha in anger
oh don't be mad I'm only here to offer
you my friendship join me teach me the
magical spells and together you and I
can attack miracle and and rule it like
kings just you and me I will never
betray my brothers
oh don't be foolish your brothers threw
you out of your own house don't you get
it
pegye sandra wants nothing but the
throne to himself back in miracle and
sleepy bat who heard everything from a
guard went to peg ascender at once and
explained everything that he had heard
oh wise King Aryan is innocent and so is
the princess your brother did not want
to disturb your sleep and Hansel waited
till the morning to break the news to
you Pekka sander was ashamed he looked
at Doral oh and said Tyrell oh I've made
a huge mistake
let us go at once and get our brother
back you can take the life out of me but
I will never believe you and turn
against my own brothers very well then
you leave me no choice shadow ha
released his black magic and directed it
to awards Aryan but name is death right
took the hit
just then pekus endure endure a low
arrived and released immense energies
from the Warriors the Soul rippers along
with shadow ha at once turned into dust
pegye sander and Darla landed near Aryan
who kept weeping by Naina's body
pegye sander with his magic wand revived
nana and she slowly opened her eyes
Ariane was ecstatic thank you so much
Big Brother don't thank me you little
one or I am to be blamed for exiling you
without even giving you a chance to
speak you did what a king would do and
that is why we look up to you pegye
sander and Ariane hugged each other I'm
so glad that you've relighted with your
brothers Aryan please allow me now to
take your leave you cannot go I'm in
love with you I'm in love with you Jill
Aryan but I do not belong with you I am
a human who has caused you a lot of
trouble please go back to your kingdom
and find a beautiful Center for yourself
tears rolled out of Aryans and Nana's
eyes look at me I am NOT a cent or any
more I am a man saya please take your
brother with you he will not listen to
me and he should not saying this pegye
sander moved his one to summon the
tornado king the leaves started to swirl
and at once a figure surrounded by
circling winds appeared
Roger eight ender why do you
summon me giraffe has taken Princess
Nina's entire kingdom and her loved ones
I want you to return everything back to
the way it was
you will also inform her father the king
that she is fine and is marrying my
youngest brother Ariane tell them I have
invited them to the grand wedding
the tornado King nodded and disappeared
naina at once jumped in joy and hugged
peg ascender peg ascender remained still
with a straight face and so did Ariane
and Doron oh I'm sorry
[Music]
pegye Center gave area back with magical
powers he could transform into a center
and a man at any time he wished to the
wedding was held at once and everyone in
miracle land were once again happy and
as for peg ascender he vowed to never
jump into conclusions before taking a
decision
[Music]
